name: package-health-extension
description: Chrome extension for JavaScript package health metrics

scripts.dev: webpack --mode=development --watch & npm run copy-assets && npm run watch-assets
scripts.watch-assets: nodemon --watch manifest.json --watch src/panel.css --watch public --exec "npm run copy-assets"
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/panel.css dist/ && cp -r public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
